components.description: Three equal-width cards with icons, headings, and descriptions

design.visualHierarchy: Centered error illustration draws initial attention, with secondary pathways through card grid below

Card-based recovery paths with clear intent categories

flow.userIntent: Recover from navigation error or accessing an invalid/restricted page
entryPoints: Direct URL navigation to non-existent page
Attempted access to page outside user permissions

interactiveElements.action: Navigate to main features (Stacking, sBTC, Wallet, Apps, Advanced)

flow.informationArchitecture: Primary recovery path (cards) + secondary navigation (sidebar) + tertiary options (footer)
frictionPoints: User landed on invalid page—may be confused about what happened
Error message is witty but could lack specificity about the actual problem
No direct 'go back' or 'go home' button prominent (must use sidebar)
